short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab create and organize lists of websites by category.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this Chrome extension, you can easily organize your favorite websites by creating custom lists.
By simply opening a new tab, you can access saved lists and quickly navigate to your desired website with a single click.
Whether it's for work, entertainment, or personal interests, this extension makes it easy to keep track of all the websites you love. 

Plus, the extension has a search bar built right into the new tab page, so you can look up anything you need without even leaving the page. You can choose one of the  multiple search engines offered. 

Say goodbye to bookmark clutter and hello to a more organized browsing experience with our new tab extension.

Privacy policy - https://littsearch.com/privacy.php
Terms and Conditions -  https://littsearch.com/terms.php
About us -  https://littsearch.com/aboutus.php
